document_data.mainbody:
Selni Ravenhair was one of the owners of Jendalars Fine Fruits in Archenbridge during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Selni was the consort and business partner of Alduvar Snowbrand. She was one of the very few people to know of Alduvars identity as the Blue Sword of Archendale, and often took care of the shop without him.
